body:
Split of from issue 100 .

In the 1st versions of Magarena there were the number of cards each cube has in front of each cube type.

I even don't know now how many cards Magarena support.

Can you put the number of cards each cube support in front of each cube?
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Show number of cards each cube support in front of each cube

**Status:** Fixed
